Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE
Name: Juglet
Description: Unguent vase with an ovoid body, a small ring base, and a narrow neck with convex lip as well as a handle. Traces of the polished brick-red slip are visible on the neck, shoulder and the base of the body. This vessel is inspired by Eastern Mediterranean models.
